Title: FLOSS Weekly 718: Future of openSUSE Leap - Luboš Kocman, Douglas DeMaio, openSUSE Leap
Description:
Doc Searls and Jonathan Bennett talk with Luboš Kocman and Douglas DeMaio about openSUSE Leap, where it's going, and lots of related Linux and open source issues coming up now and in the near future.

Hosts: Doc Searls and Jonathan Bennett

Guests: Lubos Kocman and Douglas DeMaio

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/floss-weekly
